trans-unit.source: Represents the `webServices` element in the configuration file.
This element controls the settings of XML Web services.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.WebServicesSection"></xref> class.
Gets the collection of conformance warnings for the Web Service.
This property corresponds to the `configurationWarnings` element in the configuration file.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.WsiProfilesElementCollection"></xref> object that represents the collection of conformance warnings for the Web Service.
Gets a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.WebServicesSection"></xref> object that represents the current section.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.WebServicesSection"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.DiagnosticsElement"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.WebServicesSection"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.DiagnosticsElement"></xref> for the current configuration file.
Gets one of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.WebServiceProtocols"></xref> values that indicates the Web service protocol.
One of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.WebServiceProtocols"></xref> values.
Retrieves the specified configuration section.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.Configuration"></xref> object that represents the section to be retrieved.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.WebServicesSection"></xref> object that represents the section being retrieved.
config is `null`.
Gets the transmission protocol that is used to decrypt data sent from a client browser in an HTTP request.
The data sent in an HTTP request to an XML Web service can contain method calls and parameters.

A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.WebServiceProtocols"></xref> object that represents the transmission protocol that is used to decrypt data sent from a client browser in an HTTP request.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.TypeElementCollection"></xref> that specifies the service description format extension to run within the scope of the configuration file.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.TypeElementCollection"></xref> that specifies the service description format extension to run within the scope of the configuration file.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.SoapEnvelopeProcessingElement"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.WebServicesSection"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.SoapEnvelopeProcessingElement"></xref> for the current configuration file.

Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.TypeElementCollection"></xref> that specifies the SOAP extensions to run when a service description for an XML Web service within the scope of the configuration file is accessed.

A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.TypeElementCollection"></xref> that specifies the SOAP extensions to run when a service description for an XML Web service within the scope of the configuration file is accessed.

Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.TypeElementCollection"></xref> that specifies the SOAP extensions to run when a service description is generated for all XML Web services within the scope of the configuration file.

A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.TypeElementCollection"></xref> that specifies the SOAP extensions to run when a service description is generated for all XML Web services within the scope of the configuration file.

Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.SoapExtensionTypeElementCollection"></xref> that specifies the SOAP extensions to run with all XML Web services within the scope of the configuration file.

A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.SoapExtensionTypeElementCollection"></xref> that specifies the SOAP extensions to run with all XML Web services within the scope of the configuration file.
Gets a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.TypeElement"></xref> object that corresponds to the protocol used to call the Web service.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.TypeElement"></xref> object that corresponds to the protocol used to call the Web service.
Gets a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.TypeElementCollection"></xref> object that represents the SoapTransportImporterTypes configuration element.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.TypeElementCollection"></xref> object that represents the `SoapTransportImporterTypes` configuration element.
Gets the Web service Help page (an .aspx file) that is displayed to a browser when the browser navigates directly to an ASMX page.

A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.WsdlHelpGeneratorElement"></xref> object that specifies the XML Web service Help page (an .aspx file) that is displayed to a browser when the browser navigates directly to an ASMX XML Web service page.
